content.description: In the following procedure, the parameter n is an integer greater than 2.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the value returned by the procedure?

choices.label: The procedure returns nothing because it will not terminate.
The procedure returns the value of 2 * n.
The procedure returns the value of n * n.
The procedure returns the sum of the integers from 1 to n.

content.answer: The procedure returns the sum of the integers from 1 to n.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
